main event: A bright reddish-orange elliptical object was briefly sighted and tracked by ground radar in Benton, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object disappeared within 7 seconds after being observed., It was tracked as a single object., Witnesses included reliable Air Force personnel., The weather conditions were described as clear with scattered isolated thunderstorms in the area., The probable cause of the sighting was established as a meteorite.
witness description: Dobbie Thomas, A/2C and Earthlow Brooks, A/2C, both from the 646th AC&W
